attributes.action: publically acknowledge that we are not "motorists", but workers/parents etc... - vital to the UK economy and society.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The governemt repeatedly condemns "motorists" and blames them for all the ills of the world, whilst trying to justify ever higher taxes on vehicles/fuel/roads (or whichever latest highway robbery scheme).

I am a husband first, a worker second, and a motorist last.  I drive because I have to.
We are not motorists, we are people trying to go about our daily lives - I drive to work, I don't work to drive.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
